name: Arunachal Pradesh
funFacts: The first Indian soil to receive the morning sun.
Home to India's largest monastery in Tawang.

description_section.title: The Land of the Dawn-Lit Mountains
description_section.content: Arunachal Pradesh stands as India’s sentinel in the east, a massive carbon sink where the Himalayas meet the sun.

land_and_memory.title: Donyi-Polo & The Tani Spirit
land_and_memory.content: A cosmic worldview where the Sun and Moon are the physical eyes of the Supreme Power, fostering a symbiotic relationship with nature.

defining_themes.title: Vertical Landscapes
defining_themes.description: Transitions from sub-tropical valleys to glaciated Himalayan peaks.

defining_themes.title: Tribal Mosaic
defining_themes.description: Home to 26 major tribes and over 100 sub-tribes.

contributions.title: Kiwi Bowl of India
contributions.description: Producer of over 56% of India's Kiwis with organic certification.

ways_to_experience.title: Spiritual Monasteries
ways_to_experience.description: Visit the Tawang Monastery, 'Chosen by Horse'.

essentials_summary.permit_name: ILP for Indians / PAP for Foreigners

name: Assam
funFacts: Home to the world's largest contiguous tea-growing area.
Host to Majuli, the world's largest river island.

description_section.title: The Gateway to the East
description_section.content: Dominated by the mighty Brahmaputra, Assam is the demographic and economic anchor of the Northeast.

land_and_memory.title: The Philosophy of Lahe Lahe
land_and_memory.content: An unhurried pace of life that values patience and social connection over hyper-productivity.

defining_themes.title: Brahmaputra Lifeblood
defining_themes.description: The only 'male' river in India, shaping culture and agriculture.

defining_themes.title: Wild Resilience
defining_themes.description: Success stories in rhino conservation at Kaziranga.

contributions.title: Global Tea Hub
contributions.description: Produces over 50% of India's malty Assam tea.

contributions.title: Muga Silk
contributions.description: The golden silk that improves its luster with every wash.

name: Manipur
funFacts: Home to the world's only floating National Park.

description_section.title: A Mosaic of Ancient Traditions
description_section.content: Manipur is a crossroad of Southeast Asian influence and Indian heritage.

land_and_memory.title: The Floating World
land_and_memory.content: Defined by Loktak Lake and its Phumdis—floating masses of life that support entire communities.

defining_themes.title: Matriarchal Commerce
defining_themes.description: The Ima Keithel is the only market in the world run entirely by women.

contributions.title: Origin of Polo
contributions.description: Historically played with seven players on indigenous ponies.

ways_to_experience.title: Classical Dance
ways_to_experience.description: Witness the fluid grace of the Raas Lila.

name: Meghalaya
funFacts: Mawsynram is the rainiest place on earth.
Home to bridges made of living tree roots.

description_section.title: Where Rain Tells Stories
description_section.content: A geological marvel of caves and waterfalls carved by the highest rainfall on the planet.

land_and_memory.title: Lineage of the Mother
land_and_memory.content: A rare matrilineal society where property and family name pass through the youngest daughter.

defining_themes.title: Bio-Engineering
defining_themes.description: The Jingkieng Jri (Living Root Bridges) grow stronger with age.

contributions.title: Lakadong Turmeric
contributions.description: World-renowned for its high curcumin content (7%+).

ways_to_experience.title: Whistling Villages
ways_to_experience.description: In Kongthong, mothers call their children with unique musical tunes.

name: Mizoram
funFacts: Hosts shops without shopkeepers based on total trust.

description_section.title: The High-Altitude Haven
description_section.content: A land of deep valleys and community discipline, where ethics guide daily life.

land_and_memory.title: The Code of Tlawmngaihna
land_and_memory.content: An ethical code of selflessness and hospitality that defines the Mizo spirit.

defining_themes.title: Community Trust
defining_themes.description: Nghahlou Dawr - shops where you pay based on honesty.

ways_to_experience.title: Cheraw Dance
ways_to_experience.description: The rhythmic bamboo dance, ancient and precise.

name: Nagaland
funFacts: Home to the Naga Mircha, one of the world's hottest chillies.
Kohima was the turning point of WWII in the East.

description_section.title: The Warrior Spirit
description_section.content: A land of 16 major tribes, each guarding a distinct legacy of song, dance, and craft.

land_and_memory.title: The Morung Legacy
land_and_memory.content: Traditional bachelor dormitories served as the heartbeat of oral history and social values.

defining_themes.title: Festival of Festivals
defining_themes.description: The Hornbill Festival brings all 16 tribes together in unity.

contributions.title: King Chilli
contributions.description: Naga Mircha was the first product from the state to get a GI tag.

ways_to_experience.title: WWII History
ways_to_experience.description: Pay respects at the Kohima War Cemetery on Garrison Hill.

name: Sikkim
funFacts: Home to the third highest peak in the world, Mt. Kangchenjunga.

description_section.title: The Spiritual Sanctuary
description_section.content: A Buddhist kingdom turned state, where mountains are deities and lakes are holy.

land_and_memory.title: Beyul Demazong
land_and_memory.content: The 'Hidden Valley of Rice'—a spiritual landscape blessed by Guru Rinpoche.

defining_themes.title: Organic Living
defining_themes.description: 100% organic farming, banning all chemical pesticides.

contributions.title: Large Cardamom
contributions.description: The majority producer of India's high-value large cardamom.

ways_to_experience.title: High Passes
ways_to_experience.description: Travel to Nathu La, the ancient silk route pass.

essentials_summary.permit_name: RAP for Foreigners / PAP for Border Areas

name: Tripura
funFacts: Unakoti houses 'one less than a crore' rock-cut carvings.
Home to the second largest rubber production in India.

description_section.title: A Royal Legacy
description_section.content: A former princely kingdom blending Hindu, Tribal, and Islamic architectural influences.

land_and_memory.title: The Curse of Unakoti
land_and_memory.content: Ancient stone carvings that tell the story of one night when Shiva cursed a crore of deities.

defining_themes.title: Lake Palaces
defining_themes.description: Neermahal, the water palace built in the middle of Rudrasagar Lake.

contributions.title: Natural Rubber
contributions.description: A major contributor to the rural economy through rubber plantations.

contributions.title: Queen Pineapple
contributions.description: The state fruit, GI-tagged for its unique sweetness.
